predicate.note: Frames file for 'buck' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 49, no other framed members. No Framenet entry. No comparison.

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: In late trading Friday, Jaguar shares bucked the downward tide in London's stock market and rose five pence to 725 pence ($11.44).
example.arg: the downward tide in London's stock market

example.name: with manner
example.text: But Texas Air, the owner of Continental and Eastern airlines, bucked the group's decline by rising 7/8 to 14 5/8 in American Stock Exchange trading.
example.arg: Texas Air, the owner of Continental and Eastern airlines,
by rising 7/8 to 14 5/8 in American Stock Exchange trading
